page.title: 07HOW I LIVE IN HOUNSLOW
page.content: Here is one boys description of what it is like to{live in Hounslow}in 1985. The date is 10th July 1985. "I live in the London Borough of Hounslow, which is situated to the west of London. My name is Alun Evans and I live at 28 Leighton Drive, Osterley. There are four members in my{family}and I have 2 dogs and 1 cat. I would like to tell you about {Hounslow}and what it is like to live in. There are a lot of good sports facilities, like a park called Redlees with tennis and football areas. We have an airport called{Heathrow,}it is the biggest airport in Britain. The main{religion}in our community is Christian, there are a number of other prominent religions as well, Sikhs, Muslims and Hindhus. Today we have big shops so we can buy a lot of things in one go, we have to go to the shops!"
